==Desirability== The '''scales of the Dragon King'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|1002}} are +9 gold dragon scales with an extra helping of [[willpower]]. Any character that doesn't care much about [[encumbrance]] will greatly appreciate this armour. While you can get better [[AC]] by enchanting a mundane set of GDS, using this artefact saves [[scrolls of enchant armour]] for other purposes. The willpower helps, too. ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], this item was called the '''armour of the Dragon King'''. *This armour's [[encumbrance rating]] (along with all gold dragon scales in general) has eased from -27 (prior to [[0.14]]), and -25 (prior to 0.16), to its present rating of 23. *Prior to [[0.14]], the armour of the Dragon King gave +50 [[MR]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Body armour]]
